casebody.data:
In the matter of the lunacy of Robert Price. To obtain an order of reference to a Master to inquire whether one who had been declared a lunatic is restored &c., a petition of the person who had been so declared should be presented. Mr. P. J). Vroom

read a petition of the Committee of the lunatic, stating that he was restored to his reason, and praying a reference to a Master to inquire whether he was restored, &c.

The Chancellor

suggested that the petition of Robert Price should bo obtained.

Mr. Vroom assented; and his petition was afterwards obtained ; and the order of reference made.
